EmailTemplate.name: MC-2022FY-HHS-ENT-HWBR-MARCH-WEBINAR-MKTG-MATERIALS.pre-event-3-nonopens2
EmailTemplate.subject: Bringing a digital strategy to life
EmailTemplate.textOnly: WEBINAR Virtual care transformation: Insights from leading health systems Thursday, March 31, 2022 1–2 PM Eastern Join Bruce Brandes, Senior Vice President of Health System Innovation at Teladoc Health, as he reviews important considerations when redesigning a care delivery model, from in-person to virtual or hybrid, and gain key insights on bringing a digital strategy to life. About Teladoc Health Teladoc Health is empowering all people everywhere to live healthier lives by transforming the healthcare experience. Recognized as the world leader in whole-person virtual care, Teladoc Health leverages clinical expertise, advanced technology and actionable data insights to meet the evolving needs of consumers and healthcare professionals.
